title: The Walking Dead casts Paola Lázaro as key character Princess in season 10
text:
The Walking Dead has a new addition to the cast (Picture: AMC)

The Walking Dead has cast Paola Lázaro as character Princess in the show’s tenth season.

The casting was announced at the show’s New York Comic-Con panel, which had showrunner Angela Kang, chief content officer Scott Gimple, creator Robert Kirkman, Danai Gurira, Jeffrey Dean Morgan and more in attendance.

She’ll join a number of new additions in season 10, including Thora Birch as Whisperer Gamma and Juan Javier Cardenas as Dante.

The introduction of Juanita Sanchez aka Princess, however, could mark the arrival of a key storyline from the comics (turn back now if you don’t want spoilers).

Princess in The Walking Dead comics (Picture: Image Comics)

In the comics, Princess meets the group as Michonne leads an expedition to a new community, tagging along as they venture towards the Commonwealth.

The show has previously hinted at the introduction of the Commonwealth, with the radio communications in season nine and those helicopters, so it seems like the tenth season could finally introduce them into the show.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It’s also interesting considering this is one of the final arcs in Robert Kirkman’s comics, so could this mean The Walking Dead TV show is similarly heading towards an end?

Paola Lazaro previously starred in Lethal Weapon (Picture: Laura Cavanaugh/FilmMagic)

The show’s tenth season will see Danai Gurira’s Michonne depart the show after seven years, following Rick Grimes (Andrew Lincoln) and Carl (Chandler Riggs) in recent seasons.

The Walking Dead producer Denise Huth recently teased whether we could see Michonne return in the planned Rick Grimes movies, and she didn’t exactly rule out the possibility.

The Walking Dead season 10 kicks off on Sunday 6 October in the US, and returns in the UK on Fox Monday 7 October.

MORE: The Walking Dead producer is ‘very hopeful’ that Lauren Cohan will return as Maggie
description: The Walking Dead has cast a new significant character in season 10.
